Description: Hello! up for auction here is a pre owned ESP LTD M-202 series guitar. The guitar has been tested and works well. All knobs and switches work as it should. The guitar itself shows signs of wear from use like Scratches, marks, chips, discoloring. Please ask any and all questions before bidding. Good luck and kindly check out my other auctions. Copied information: ESP LTD M series is a home to some of the best and finest lower intermediate and intermediate guitars in the world. These six and seven stringers feature modern Soloist bodies, slim and fast necks and reliable electronics and hardware. Simplicity in design and construction is also one of their strong points. M-202 is probably the most popular model in the lineup, almost being synonymous with words affordable and high quality metal guitar. It comes with a solid and double-cut body made of basswood, which is combined with a standard bolt-on maple neck. ESP`s slim and fast U contour is found on the back of the neck, while the body is flat and fit with a deep lower cutaway. Licensed Floyd Rose bridge, Duncan Designed HB-102 pickups and a 24-fret rosewood fingerboard complete the major specs list.
